project.name: tampapalms
project.description: Next.js 15 App Router site for the Tampa Palms Professional Center leasing and marketing pages.

routes.purpose: Supabase read of buildings inventory and availability.
Contact form submission, Supabase insert, and nodemailer confirmations.
Create notify_requests rows when users ask for suite availability alerts.
Cron-triggered availability notifier; sends emails and marks notify requests complete.
Reusable transactional/marketing email sender for availability and marketing templates.
Administrative listing of users table entries.
Unsubscribe token handler used in email links.
Transform relative image paths to absolute URLs.

vercel.purpose: Poll notify_requests and email users when suites become available.

cards.title: Consistent Quality Standards
cards.desc: A secure, well-maintained Class-A environment built for professional teams.

cards.title: Service Designed Around Your Workflow
cards.desc: Responsive, high-quality support that keeps your organization focused on its core priorities.

cards.title: Community-Driven Growth
cards.desc: A professional environment where strong business relationships form and companies thrive.

featureTiles.heading: Custom Wrought-Iron Entry Doors and Beautifully Landscaped Entries
featureTiles.blurb: Custom craftsmanship and lush landscaping come together to create a warm, inviting, and memorable entrance.

featureTiles.heading: Elegant Architectural Design With Professional Appeal
featureTiles.blurb: Sophisticated architecture combines elegance with a strong, professional presence.

featureTiles.heading: Ten-Foot Ceilings
featureTiles.blurb: Open atmosphere that adds a sense of space and sophistication to every room.

featureTiles.heading: Sound Insulated Walls and Solid Core Doors
featureTiles.blurb: Thick, insulated walls and solid core doors ensure a quiet, private, and comfortable environment.

amenityColumns.title: Buildings/Suites
amenityColumns.description: Modern, suites in a prime location, combining convenience, comfort, and style.
items: Fiber high speed optic internet
Assigned mailboxes with USPS delivery directly to the building
Professional business address with private mailbox
Peaceful, scenic surroundings near lakeside walkways
Located within a premier, multi-use business park for office, medical, and professional tenants
Convenient access to top-rated schools, restaurants, parks, and the Tampa Palms Country Club featuring an Arthur Hills–designed golf course
Ample on-site parking for tenants and visitors

supportHighlights.title: Guided onboarding
supportHighlights.copy: Our team can help with basic walk-throughs, getting you oriented, and general tech guidance to make your move-in smoother.

supportHighlights.title: Responsive service
supportHighlights.copy: Maintenance requests go to our local team, who keep you updated and aim to handle issues as smoothly as possible.

supportHighlights.title: Long-term partnership
supportHighlights.copy: We’re around for check-ins, basic space-planning help, and general updates so your suite fits your day-to-day needs.

primeLocation.title: Prime Location
listItems: Located right off I-75 and Bruce B. Downs, one of the busiest corridors in Tampa Bay.
Only a couple minutes from the interstate.
Less than ten minutes from I-4 and I-275.
Easy access to the entire region.

cards.title: Submit Request
cards.description: Log into the partner portal anytime to open a new work order and share supporting photos or notes.

cards.title: Handled by Experts
cards.description: Our maintenance partner assigns the right technician, coordinates scheduling, and keeps you informed.

cards.title: Stay Updated
cards.description: Track progress, receive notifications, and close out the request once the job is completed to your satisfaction.
